Subjects: women, praise of; Virgin Mary, praise of
_description: In praise of women and the Virgin Mary — four 3-line stanzas and burden: ‘Of alle thynges that god …’

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
Wymmen ben Of alle þyngis þat gev[ ]Wymmen ben fayre for
                    to [ ]Wommen ben fayre in [ ]Wommen were y nisst of [ ]ho so wol
                    yse geden h[ ]…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…Al þe world he for so[ ]Sche bare achylde þat [
                    ]
CULAdd5943.Note: Text imperfect; right edge cut down with loss of line ends.
